VITE_API_URL.description: Backend API URL - Replace with your actual deployed backend URL

important: Replace 'your-backend-url.railway.app' with your actual backend deployment URL
After adding variables, you MUST redeploy for changes to take effect
VITE_ prefix is required for Vite to expose the variable to the frontend
howToAdd: 1. Go to Vercel Dashboard → Your Project → Settings → Environment Variables
4. Enter your backend URL as the value
